De la cura de hernia entestinal.	Of the care of intestinal hernia.</end_turn
Le adveniment de aquesta hernia es per seccio que endeve en le ciphac extendut sobre le ventre de part dels angunars del mirac del ventre, per que deysendo les budels de aquela ruptura ad alcu dels budels.	The occurrence of this hernia is for incision that extends on the cipah extended over the belly from the flanks to the navel, because by giving way the bulges of that break are brought to the belly of the intestines.</end_turn
E aquesta ruptura es o del ciphac o de excencio de lu, e accideysso aquestas doas specias per motas causas: o percussio, o per sautz, o per clamor, o per elevacio de alcuna causa greu, o per semblantz.	And this break is of the cipah or of excess of it, and it occurs for various causes: or for percussion, or for vomiting, or for crying, or for elevation of any cause, or for similar things.</end_turn
E·l senhal de aquo, quan es per extencio del ciphac, es que accideys pauc a pauc en lonc temps, e no accideys soptament, e es apostema engual entro ves le preon per so quar le ciphac comprem le budel.	And the sign of this is that it occurs little by little over a long time, and does not occur suddenly, and is swelling that enters within the belly so that the cipah compresses the intestine.</end_turn
E le senhal de lu es quan es per seccio del ciphac, quar al comensament fa accidir dolor vehement sobtament; e es apostema divers aparent dejos la codena propdana aparent, e aquo es per eyssiment del budel, e·l cos de lu a las partidas deforo del ciphac.	And the sign of this is when it occurs suddenly with violent pain at the beginning; and is swelling different from the apparent outside the navel, and that is for the bursting of the intestine, and the body of the hernia to the flanks of the cipah.</end_turn
E alcunas veguadas es fora-getat am le budel la tela, e es apelada aquesta hernia entestinal zirbal.	And many doctors forget about the gut the membrane, and call this intestinal hernia.
E alcunas veguadas es fayta am ventositat, e alcunas veguadas corr en le budel fenda, e aqui es retenguda, e es am aquo gran pernitia3 del malaute, e alcunas veguadas fa endevenir dolor malvada e majorment quan es premut.	And some doctors are useless with wind, and some doctors run in the belly wound, and here it is retained, and it is in this way that it brings great discomfort to the patient, and some doctors make it worse by causing great pain and most of all when pressing.</end_turn
E en la curacio de las especias de aquesta malautia am ferr es temor, per que cove que sia esquivat le cazament en aquela.	And in the treatment of these diseases of this disease there is fear, for that you must avoid the cause in that case.</end_turn
E la manieyra de la operacio de aquela es que comandes al malaute que redugua le budel am la sua ma a las partidas dedintz de la sua conquavitat si obezeys al sieu retornament, e aprop sia envessat sobre le sieu col entre las tuas mas, e eleva las cambas de lu.	And the manner of the operation of that is that you command the patient to reduce the intestine with his hand to the depths of its concavity if he obeys your return order, and then be covered over his belly between your legs, and raise his legs.</end_turn
E aprop sten la codena la qual siec la codena dels testicols a las partidas desus, e inscideys la codena dels testicols tota per le lonc; e aprop fiqua en doas labias de la seccio uncis segon que indigeysses a hubrir la seccio am aquels.	Then tighten the clamp which holds the testicles to the lower parts, and with a pointed instrument incision the testicles throughout their length; and then fix two lips of the incision as you would to open the incision with those.
E si’ la seccio segon la quantitat que a tu sia possible que de aquela le huou sia foro-getat.	If the incision according to the quantity that you are able to bear can be completely forgotten.</end_of_turn>
E aprop excorja aquela ciphaqueth les quals so dejos la codena dels testicols, entro que sia descubert le ciphac blanc dur de quascuna partida.	Then remove the discharge which remains from the testicles until the white tough membrane covering any part is discovered.</end_of_turn
Lahoras tu entromet le tieu dit en aquo que siec le testicol, en aquo que es entre ciphac blanc, le qual es dejos la codena del huou, e entre le ciphac segon, e absolve am aquel’adherencia que es en la partida detras del huou.	Then bring out the bladder which is said to be under the testicles, in which is between the white membranes which is left from the testicles, and the other from the scrotum, and remove anything that adheres to that part behind the testicles.</end_of_turn>
E aprop mau am la ma la codena dels testicols a las partidas deforo, e am aysso exten le ciphac blanc en sus am la ma sinestra, e eleva le huou am le ciphac a la partida de la seccio; e comanda al ministre que extenda le huou ensus e tu dissolveys la adherencia que es detras am solucio complida.	And put your hand on the clamp of the testicles towards the front, and with the left hand extend the white membrane over the hand, and elevate the testicles towards the incision; and command the assistant to extend the testicles outwards and you dissolve the adherence that is behind the incision after it has been completed.</end_of_turn
E cerqua am les tieus ditz que lay no sia alcuna causa del budel envelopat en le ciphac blanc dur.	And know that there is no cause for the intestine being covered in the tough white membrane.</end_of_turn
Mays si tu atrobas de lu alcuna causa, lahoras tu enpelleys aquel al ventre dejos.	Or if you find any cause, then leave it in the belly.</end_of_turn
E aprop tu pren una agulha en la qual sia fiel gros fayt de x fiels, e entromet aquel deves le derier del ciphac, le qual es jos la codena dels testicols, la qual siec seccio; e aprop inscideys las extremitatz las quals emineysso del fiel entro que sian quatre fiels, e aprop compausa alcus de lor sobre alcuna figura en manieyra de crotz; e lia am aquel le ciphac del qual havem dit que es dejos la codena dels testicols am fort liament de dos partz.	And take a needle which is strong enough to make a hole four fingers wide, and bring out what you must from under the testicles, which is under the clamp; and with the point of the needle pierce the corners which border the wound as far as there are four fingers, and compose the edges of the wound in the shape of a cross; and tie the two ends of the ligature which we mentioned that is left from the testicles with strong thread.</end_of_turn
E aprop envolveys las extremitatz dels fiels e lia aquelas am liament vehement entro que alcu dels vayssels que noyrrisso aquels no puscan trametre alcuna causa per so que de aqui no accida apostema caut.	And bandage the ends of the fingers and tie them securely so that no blood vessels which are around them are compressed so that no swelling results from here.</end_of_turn
E pausa autra veguada liament segon foro le primier liament, lonh de lu mens tres ditz; e aprop aquestz dos liaments layssa del ciphac le qual es dejos la codena dels testicols la quantitat de la grandeza del dit, e inscideys tot le romanent segon redondeza, e osta de lu le huou.	And wait another three fingers’ length beyond the first ligature; and then pass two ligatures around the part of the intestine which is left from the testicles as much as the thickness of the finger, and pierce all that remains round about, and leave the intestines in place.</end_of_turn
E aprop inscideys en la partida dejos de la codena dels testicols per seccio de la qual corra sanc e sania ayssi cum havem recomtat en aquo que havem dit.	And pierce the part behind the testicles for the incision from which blood will flow freely and safely as we have recommended above.</end_of_turn
E aprop aministra lana submersa en oli, e pausa en la plagua; e aministra le liament le qual havem recomtat (e alcunas veguadas le ciphac blanc es cauterizat, le qual havem dit aprop la inscizio de lu temen de flux de sanc, quar motas veguadas accideys aquels) e leyssa le liament entro que per si caia.	And administer lard submerged in oil, and place it on the wound; and administer the ligature which we have recommended (since several veins around the white membrane are cauterized, which we mentioned before causes the fear of blood flow, which often happens in these places).
Mays si le cazement de lu es tardat, lahoras de aygua cauda sia embrocat, e pausa sobre aquel entro que caia segon que havem dit.	If the case is delayed, cold water should be placed around the area, and leave it on until it falls as we have said.</end_of_turn
E aprop cura la plagua am l’autra curacio de las plaguas entro que sia sanat.	And take care of the wound with the other care of wounds until it is healed.</end_of_turn>

De hernia ventosa.	Of the windy hernia.</end_of_turn

De la disropcio que es fayta en les anguonars.	Of the dislocation which is useful in the joints.</end_of_turn

De mollificacio de la codena dels testiculs.	Treatment of the knee of the testicles.
Motas veguadas la codena dels testiculs en alcus homes es mollificada per aysso quar las carns que so entre aquela son mollificadas, e es fedat le reguardament de lu.	The swelling of the knee of the testicles in acute cases is softened by the application of warm compresses, because the surrounding tissues are softened, and it is fed from them
Adonc necessari es ad aquel que es preguat en la curacio de lu que fassa jazer le malaute segon le sieu dos, e enscida tota la codena la qual es mollificada sobre la codena natural; e aprop que ajuste doas labias am la sutura. De castracio.	Of castration
Sapias que castratio en nostre ley es excomengada, mays per causa es legut a mi que·m remembre de lu en aquest libre; e no es necessaria la rememoracio de lu sino per doas manieyras, de las quals es la una per so que aquo sia en la sciensa del metge quan es enterroguat de aquela, que sapia la curacio de lu al qual accideys; e l’autra manieyra es que nos motas vetz havem necessitat de castracio de autras bestias per les juvamentz nostres per aquelas, ayssi cum de motos, e de bocs, e de porcs, e de semblantz a las bestias.	Wisdom has it that castration is forbidden in our laws, however I recall it in this book; and it is not necessary to recall it except for two cases. The one is when the physician is questioned about it, for he should know how to cure it. The other case is when we must castrate other animals for our food, such as pigs, horses, goats, and the like.
E donc dic que castracio es fayta en dos manieyras: o per atrissio, o per fissura a seccio.	Therefore I say that castration is useful in two ways: by traction or by incision to the root
Mays en aquela que es fayta per atrissio, la via de la opera es que nos fassam cezer la bestia en aygua cauda entro que·ls genetius de lu sian mollificatz e sian linhitz e que pendan.	In that case where traction is useful, the way of performing the operation is to immerse the animal in cold water until the testicles are softened and limp and hanging down
E aprop pren aquels am la tua ma entro que sian resols e no apparescan dejos le tocament.	And then take hold of them with your hand until they are resolved and do not appear to be touching each other
Mays en castracio fayta per fissura e seccio, cove que tu tenguas la bestia e premas la codena dels testicols de lu am la ma senestra.	And in castration that is useful by incision and cutting, grasp the animal and hold the knee of the testicles with your left hand
E aprop lia le suspensori, e inscideys sobre quascun huou am una seccio entro que dos huous proceseysso.	And then ligate the surgeon, and make an incision over every blood vessel with a section so that two veins protrude.
E aprop inscideys aquels pus que auras quascu excorjat.	And then make the incisions more than enough that there may be no further tearing
E no leysses sobre aquels del ciphac alcuna causa, sino le ciphac subtil le qual es sobre les vazes.	Do not worry about any bleeding from the wound, but rather the delicate skin over the veins
E aquesta manieyra de castracio es milhor la qual es fayta per atrissio, quar atrissio fort leu layssa alcuna causa dels testicols per que la bestia desira coyt.	This method of castration is better than traction, for traction causes strong pain and often leaves any cause of the testicles because the animal desires to bite
E aprop cura la plagua entro que sia sanada.	And care for the wound until it is healed

De la cura de hermafrodozia.	Of the care of hermaphroditism.
Hermafrodozia en les homes es segon dos manieyras: la una es quar o appar en aquo que siec l’espazi en la codena de testiculs, en aquel que es entre dos testiculs figura quar cunh de femna en la qual so pels.	Hermaphroditism in men is according to two methods: when there is an opening in the knee of the testicles in which the space between two testicles appears to be a female organ in which a fetus is found
E alcunas veguadas de aquel corr urina le qual es en la codena dels testiculs.	And some women of that age urinate in the knee of the testicles
Mays en las femnas es una specia: e es que·l conh de la femna sobre le pentenilh es ayssi cum dos testiculs de home un pauc de tot yminiheys a la partida deforo ayssi cum le perpucii de home e dos testicols.	The pain in the knees is like that of two testicles of a man, a little more at the front and a little less at the back.
E la curacio es de tres specias: de dos dels homes e de una specia de las femnas.	There are three methods of treatment: two for men and one for women.
E es que cove que tu inscidas aquelas carns ajustadas entro que efuga la emprecio de aquela, e aprop que cures aquelas am curacio de las autras plaguas.	Therefore you must remove the swollen flesh until the footprint of the disease has vanished, and then treat the remaining wounds as for other ailments.
E en la segonda specia dels homes de la qual yeys urina la qual es en la codena dels testiculs, no es curacio ni opperacio en lu.	As for the second method for men, which is the one that produces urine in the testicles, there is neither treatment nor operation for that.

De lentinge e de carn eminent per causas de las femnas.	Women often suffer from severe and prominent ailments.
Lentige fort leu es ajustada sobre causas naturals entro que es etressat e es fayt leg le reguardament; e alcunas veguadas es magnificada en alcunas femnas en tant entro que es spandit ayssi cum en les homes e perve entro al coito.	The great swelling often arises from natural causes, and is rightly regarded as such; and some women suffer from it to such an extent that it expands just as much in women as in men, and even during coitus.
Adonc cove que tu tenguas la superfluitat de lentinge am la tua ma o am unci e inscidas.	Therefore remove the swelling with your hand or with an instrument and instill it.
E no ultimes en inscizio, majorment en le preon de la razit, per so que no endevengua flux de sanc.	Do not hesitate to perform the incision, especially in the area of the root of the hair, so that the blood does not clot
E aprop cura aquela am curacio de las plaguas entro que sia sanada.	And treat the remaining wound as for other ailments until it is healed
Mays carn nascuda es carn que nays en le horrifici de la mayre entro que umple aquel, e fort leu es eyssit a las partidas deforo segon semblansa de coa (e per aquo alscus primiers appelero aquo “malautia caudada”); donc cove que nos inscidam ayssi cum inscidem lentinge, e curem aquela entro que sia sanada.	Every wound is born in the horror of the mother, until it fills up again, and great swelling is seen at the front just as much as at the back according to its custom (and thus the first ones call it “disease caused by cold humors”). Therefore we must treat it just as we would a swelling, and cure it when it is healed.

De curacio de alratica.	Treatment of the toothache.
Alratica es que le conh de la femna no sia perforat, o sia le trauc petit.	A toothache is when the tooth is not perforated, or is only slightly fractured
E es o natural o accidental.	It is either natural or accidental
Accidental es per malautia la qual ha precedit, e aquela es fayta o per carn nada ajustada o per ciphac subtil o espes.	Accidental is due to an illness that preceded it, or is caused by a wound or an injury caused by a hard or soft object
E es fayt o en le preon de la mayre, o en les costatz de lu, o en le pus sobira de lu, o en le pus bas de lu, e prohibeys de cuoyt e de enprenguacio e de enfantament, e fort leu prohibeys las mestruas.	It is caused either in the front of the face, or on the sides, or on the back of the head, or in the hollow of the cheek, and it prevents talking and eating, and spitting, and even menstruation.
E la cognicio de aquela es fayta per reguardament de la metrona, si la oppilacio es apparent, propdana; mays si no es apparent, lahoras tu cerqua aquela am les tieus ditz o am le ray.	The knowledge of that is useful for diagnosis, if the swelling is evident, it is necessary; even if it is not evident, when you suspect it from the pain or from the touch
Mays si oppilacio es per ciphac subtil, e es propda a las doas labias, lahoras tu coyta e disromp aquela.	Even if the swelling is caused by a soft object, and is placed on the two lips, you should bite down and break it apart
E es que pauses sobre las doas labias pulvils, e aprop pausa les tieus ditz indicz de amdoas las mas encemps.	And hold your tongue over the two lips, and when you bite down it indicates that there are many teeth.
E la femna sia sobre le sieu dos, las sieuas coyssas extendudas, e aprop exten las doas labias am forsa entro que aquel ciphac subtil sia romput e la oppilacio sia uberta. Mays si la oppilacio es per carnada, lahoras suspen aquela am unci, e inscideys aquela.	If the swelling is caused by a wound, then suspend that with one hand and perform the incision with the other hand

De perforacio de eyssedura accident en la mayre.	Of the perforation of an abscess that happens in the belly.</start_of_turn>
Motas specias de apostemas accideysso en la mayre, ayssi cum cranc e apostema lapident e ulceracios e adhubelat e erpetromens e fistulas emorroyas e raguarrias e thyl e autres apostemas.	There are various species of abscesses that occur in the belly, such as carbuncles and abscesses of the spleen and ulcers and tumors and hernias and piles and boils and abscesses and ruptures and fistula of hemorrhoids and wounds and other abscesses.</start_of_turn
E yeu ja he dit aquestas malautias e las specias de aquelas e les senhals de aquelas, e las curacios de lor en la divisio.	And I have already said these diseases and their species and their symptoms, and their cures in the division.</start_of_turn

A ensenhar las matronas en qual manieyre les enbrios bius sian medicatz quan yeysso segon figura no-natural.	To teach the midwives how they should behave towards women who are giving birth according to an unnatural figure.
Necessaria causa es que la matrona conogua en le comensament la figura del enfantament natural per senhals de lu, e es que quan tu vezas la femna expremar a las partidas dejos e desira odorar le ayre, e sobre aquo es enleujada per aquo que sobre ela es del part, e festina le eyssiment del enbrio, lahoras sapias que aquest part es segon figura natural, e es l’eyssiment de lu sobre le sieu cap, e la segondina am aquel o suspensa o pendent del ombelic.	A necessary cause is that the midwife knows at the beginning the figure of natural childbirth through her senses, and that when the woman screams out from her bowels and desires to smell the air, and about which she is relieved by what is above her, and that she vomits, the hour is that this part is according to the natural figure, and that is the vomiting on the head, and the second one at the navel or suspension or pendency of the navel.

De curacio de las fistulas que endeveno dejos.	De curacio de las fistulas que endeveno dejos.
Las fistulas que endeveno en la partida dejos pus bassa so nodacio e grossetut las quals endeveno prop del cul defora o en l’espazi de la una partida.	The fistulas that arise in the lower parts of the legs are notable and numerous, and arise from the groin or in the space of the buttock.
E es una fistula o motas.	And it is a fistula or swelling.
E cum aquela nodacio es antiquada e corr de la humiditat aygosa blanca o poyridura subtil, e alcunas veguadas so de aquestas fistulas alcunas penetrantz.	And when that swelling is old and corrupted by the white or putrid moisture, and some veins are seen to penetrate from these fistulas.
E aquelas penetrantz so conogudas per aquo que es eyssit de aquelas per la egressio e per ventosetat; e alcunas vetz use le malaute de egressio, e fort leu es eyssit de aquelas verm.	And those that penetrate are known because they are driven out by the evacuation and the wind; and some veins use the patient's evacuation, and it is very strong that it is driven out from them.
E so de aquelas fistulas alcunas veguadas en l’espazi penetrantz entro a la vesica, e entro al meat de la vergua; e so de aquelas penetrantz entro la junctura de la coyssa e entro al notz de la coeta.	And from these fistulas some veins penetrate into the bladder, and into the marrow of the bone; and some penetrate into the joint of the thigh and into the bone of the knee.
E aquo en que es conoguda fistula penetrant entro al cul e no-penetrant, es que tu metas le tieu dit endic en le cul, e entrometas tenta subtil de eram o de ferr en la fistula quan no y es turtuositat.	And it is known that a penetrating fistula that enters the groin is not penetrating, that you must tell the patient to lie down in the groin, and that you must attempt to remove the cause or the stone in the fistula when it is not crooked.
Mays si en aquela es turtuositat, lahoras entromet en aquela tenta subtil de plom o de pels de caval entro que tu sentas la tenta o le pel en le tieu dit.	If it is crooked, then enter into that attempt with lead or horsehair until you sit on the vein or hold it in the groin.
E si no sentas aquela de tot ni no procezeys del trauc alcuna causa de egestio ni verm ni ventositat, ayssi cum havem dit, lahoras sapias que es no-penetrant, e lahoras coyta te a la curacio.	And if you do not sit on that or if you do not succeed in any way in removing the cause of evacuation or stone or wind, as we have said, then it is known that it is not penetrating, and you must be content with the treatment.

And if you sit on the groin the vein has already burst through the skin without you having to uncover it, or that you sit between the groin and the hip or thigh, it is known that it is penetrating; and do not work on that, for it is not in this treatment.
Mays empero diyssero alcus que es sana en alcus homes tart.	I say, however, that this is healthy in some homes.
E de la medicacio per la qual es sperat juvament en lu es que tu ignes cauteri subtil segon le ample de la fistula, ayssi cum es precedit, e intrometas aquel ignit en la fistula entro que pervengua entorn le cuol; e aprop itera aquel doas o tres vetz entro que sapias que ja son adhustas totas aquelas carns ajustadas fistuladas que so semblantz a cana de pluma de ausel.	And as for the treatment by which it is hoped to succeed in this case, it is that you burn a cautery over the surface of the fistula according to the size of the fistula, as it has been said before, and you insert that burn into the fistula until it reaches the groin; and repeat that two or three times until you see that all the inflamed tissue surrounding the fistula has become soft like feathers from a sparrow.
E aprop cura aquela am calguas envolopadas en boder entro que en yescan totas aquelas carns que so adhustas, e aprop cura aquela am medicinas la carn engendrantz e consolidantz, e si es sanada, bo es; e sino, lahoras no es sana en degun temps per autra curacio.	And then care for those who are wrapped in gauze around the edges until all those tissues that have become soft have been removed, and care for that medicine that generates and consolidates the flesh, and if it is healed, it is good; but if not, it is known that it is not healed in any other treatment.
E si la tenta intra, e no penetra entro·l tieu dit le qual es en le cul, e entre aquel e la tenta que es velament spes de carn o de ciphac, e vezes la fistula en aquo que siec la superficia de la codena, lahoras secca la codena del comensament de la fistula, e tu ve seccan am la tenta, e sia en la fistula entro que la seccio pervengua al loc en le qual perve la extremitat de la tenta, e per la tenta es liberat e catz.	And if the vein enters but does not penetrate inside the groin, where it is in the groin, between that and the vein which is visibly red from flesh or fat, and sometimes the fistula breaks the surface of the skin, then dry the wound from the start of the fistula, and you will see it dry on the vein, and be free from the fistula from the root.
E aprop mundifiqua aquelas carns fistuladas las quals so asembladas a canula de pena de ausel e no romangua de aquelas alcuna causa.	And finally soften those tissues that are joined together like needles of sparrow and do not remain from any cause
Mays si flux de sanc vezes que vengua entre tu e la tua opperacio quan ensideysses aquelas carns, lahoras le milh que sia e del pus leugier instrument es cauterizar am foc o am medicina acuta, quar cauteri am foc ajusta bonas doas habitutz: so es adhustio de aquelas carns ajustadas, e abscizio del sanc exseccacio de las humiditatz.	However, sometimes after surgery it happens that the wound comes out between you and your operation when you tighten those tissues, then it is better to burn with fire or acute medicine, because the burn on fire adjusts well many good things: it is the closing of those tissues that have been adjusted, and the excision of the excessive humidity.
E aprop cura aquela am calguas envolopadas en boder o en caus trissat entro que·l loc geta brac, e aprop lahoras cura la plagua am enguentz carn dura engendran e consolidan.	And so treat those who are wrapped in cold clothes or are wrapped in thick clothes until the limb gets warm, and then treat the wound that is inflamed and hardened.
E so medicinas en las quals so stipticitat e exseccio; quan lahoras es restaurada ja es sanada e no temes iteracio.	And so medicines that contain both styptic and excretory properties; when the limb is restored, it is already healed and does not fear recurrence.</end_of_turn>
Mays si la fistula ja perve entro al preon del cul e es elonguada de lu superficia del cos, lahoras entromet le tieu dit en le cul e inquireys am aquel.	However, if the fistula has already progressed into the belly of the buttocks and is prolonged on the surface of the body, then bring the intestine to the buttocks and inquire about that.</end_of_turn>
E donc si centes la tenta e entre tu e ela es velament de ciphac o de carn, e es propda a la penetracio, lahora no es operacio en lu sino segon via di fiducia e de speransa.	And therefore if you are certain and between you and her is wax of fat or flesh, and it is likely to penetrate, do not perform an operation on her, but rather by means of trust and hope.</end_of_turn
La qual causa es aministrar en lu una de tres manieyras: o que cauterize aquela ayssi cum havem dit; o que secces aquela entro que consieguas la conquavitat de lu per que sia a tu possible entrometre las qualcas e la curacio propdana; e no procesiscas mot am seccio per so que no inscidas le lacert contenent le cuol, e que accidisque sobre le malaute eyssiment de la egistio ses voluntat; e aprop cura aquel am aquo que havem dit quar fort leu sira sanat; o que elongues aquel velament e mondes aquel pus que seccas aquel entro prop le cul, ayssi cum havem dit, o am tenta o am autre instrument de aguda extremitat, e aprop mondifique aquelas carns fistuladas las quals so en la seccio entro la on podes am percrustacio; e aprop esforsa te a far la restauracio de tota la plagua am seccio, e si le orrifici pus desus no es consolidat, e romangua la fistula uberta en la partida del cul, e sira pus leugier per le malaute.	The cause is to administer in her one of three ways: either that you cauterize that which we have said; or that you drain that until you have restored the concavity of the limb so that you can easily remove the pieces and perform the cure; do not proceed without first draining lest you cause the wound to burst and contaminate the patient; and indeed take care of the patient immediately when she wishes it; or that you prolong that which we have said and order that pus which you drained from the buttocks be spread over the wound, as we have said, or use another sharp instrument, and mix the cauterized parts with the fistula, and strive to restore the limb to its normal state, and if the purulent discharge does not solidify, and the fistula remains open in the buttocks, and if there is still pus in the wound, you will be more curious about the patient.</end_of_turn>
E alscunas veguadas la fistula es finida segon aquesta manieyra: es quan tu entrometas la tenta en la fistula, e es en le latz del cul entorn la superficia del cos am la codena e en le marge del cul, lahoras pren tenta de perforada extremitat, que es ayssi cum agulha de preparantz les coers segon aquesta forma:	And sometimes the fistula is finished in this way: when you insert the finger into the fistula, around the buttocks on the surface of the body and at the margin of the buttocks, the limb tries to perforate the extremity, that is to say as if with a needle to prepare the layers according to this method:
e entromet en aquela fiel envolopat de v fiels o entorn aquels; e aprop entromet tenta am fiel en la fistula entro que consiegua la conquavitat de lu.	... and bring down in that flexible covering of flesh or around those; and put your finger into the fistula until you have restored the concavity of the limb.</end_of_turn
Mays si es penetrant en le marge del cul prop dedintz, lahoras tu extratz le fiel de aquel trauc ayssi que tu intrometas le tieu dit en le cul; e extraguas la extremitat del fiel e ajustes las duas extremitatz essemps, e estrenh cascuna, e leyssa aquo per un dia o per dos, e quan mays inscideys le fiel en la carn, estrenh be aquel entro que aquelas carns sian inscididas las quals so entre doas extremitatz del fiel e que cajan.	However, if it has penetrated the margin of the buttocks do not be afraid, for you will pull out the flesh from that wound as soon as you put your finger into the buttocks; withdraw the limb from the flesh and join the two ends together, and bind them; and leave them so for a day or two, and when the flesh has subsided from the bone, rejoin that which is between the two extremities of the flesh which were bound.</end_of_turn
E aprop cura la plagua entro que sia consolidada e sanada.	And so treat the wound until it is consolidated and healed.</end_of_turn>
Mays si le orrifici de la fistula no es penetrant, lahoras fay aquel penetrar, en qualque manieyre sia a tu preparat, sino que sia mot en le preon, quar no es a tu que fassas aquo per que no inscidas le lacert; e aprop fay am aquela entro que sia sanada.	However, if the discharge from the fistula is not penetrating, do not attempt to make it penetrate in any way, but rather leave it where it is until it has healed naturally; and indeed do so for the wound to heal.</end_of_turn
La forma de spatum spinos am lo qual es fenduda la fistula: la curvitat del qual es mot aguda e l’autra partida es no-aguda, per so que no inscidas aquo que no es necessari, ayssi cum vezes.	The shape of the spatum spine concerning which the fistula is split: the curvature of which is not acute and the other part is obtuse, so that you do not cause any unnecessary bleeding, as sometimes happens.</end_of_turn
De sutura de emorroydas en las quals corra sanc en la inscizio de aquelas.	Suturing of wounds in which runs safety at the incision of those.</end_of_turn
Emorroydas so segon dos manieyras, quar o so entre le cul semblantz aysi que es de carbos, o quays aquelas sian cum a gras de rasim.	Wounds are of two kinds, that is, either those that remain between the buttocks as if of cartilage, or those that are like pieces of grass.</end_of_turn
E de aquelas so petitas e grans, e que le sanc corr de aquelas tostemps e es una, e so motas, e so fora·l cul, e en las extremitatz de lu.	And these are small and large, and they run from these to those and are one, and not many, and are outside the buttocks and in the extremities of the limb.</end_of_turn
Mays empero aquelas que so foro le cul so segon las mes de pauca humiditat, de las quals corr aygua citrina o un petit de sanc am cos continuabla, e so segon la color del cos.	However, those that are outside the buttocks should be sutured according to the months of little humidity, that is to say with citrine water or a little of salt dissolved in continuous water, and according to the color of the wound.</end_of_turn
E la curacio de aquela que es dedintz le cuol es que comandes al malaute que se assela e que se exprema entro que le cuol yesca e las emoroydas apparescan a tu.	And the cure of that which comes out of the bone is that you order the patient to move and expel until the bone has scabbed over and the wounds have disappeared.</end_of_turn
Adonc tu te coyte e suspen am uncis o que tenguas aquelas am la tua ungla, e aprop incideys aquelas deves las suas razitz.	Then you lie down and suspend your hand over his nails or that you hold them in your nail, and in this way you will prevent them from bleeding.</end_of_turn
Mays si les uncis no so tengutz en aquelas per la humiditat de lor e mollificacio de aquelas, lahoras pren aquelas am drap aspre o am coto o am flassada de lana, e extratz aquelas am les tieus ditz, e aprop inscideys aquelas e polveriza sobre lor alcunas polveras caudas aprop la inscizio, per que sian ad aquelas en loc de cauteri; o cauteriza aquelas segon que es precedit en le capitol de cauterizar.	However, if the nails do not hold in those because of the humidity of them and their softening, then take the nails out of those and make them rough or blunt or split with thread, and withdraw them from the wounds, and sprinkle some powdered charcoal over them near the incision, so that it will adhere to those instead of cutting; or cauterize them as is decreed in the chapter on cauterization.</end_of_turn
E aprop cura aquelas am l’autra curacio entro que sian sanadas.	And so treat the other wound until it is healed.</end_of_turn
E si le cul no obezeys a egressio, lahoras cristerisa le malaute am cristeri en le qual sia mordicacio petita, e sia lavat am aquel aquo que es en le cuol e que obezesca a egressio leugierament quan le malaute s’esprem.	If the pain persists despite evacuation, then crush the patient's abdomen with your thumbs, and bathe it in the urine that is in the bladder, which obediently evacuates when the patient is squeezed.
Mays si las emorroydas so defora le cul, lahoras la causa de lor es leugiera, e es que tu prenguas aquelas am la tua ungla, o que prenguas aquelas am unci, e inscidas aquelas, e aprop cura aquelas am aquo que havem dit entro que sian sanadas.	Even if the swellings are outside the belly, the cause is light, for you can grasp those with your nail or grasp them with a finger, and instill them, and thus cure them with the urine that has been mentioned earlier.</end_of_turn>
E aquel que avoreys inscizio, cove que aministres sutura de lor segon aquesta manieyra: pren fiel envolopat e entromet aquel en agulha e aprop extratz las emorroydas a las partidas dessus, e fay aquel penetrar am la agulha en la razit del autra part, e envolveys las doas extramitatz del fiel en la partida pus dejos de la agulha, e so latitudinalment; e estrenh la emorroyda am strectura fort, e aprop noza le fiel e extratz la agulha.	And if you wish to make an incision, cover that you administer sutures according to this manner: take fine thread and pass it through a needle, and then extract the swellings from the parts above, and make that penetrate through the needle in the root of the other part, and wrap the two ends of the thread in the part beyond the needle, and stretch the swelling laterally; and then close the swelling with a strong structure, and then do not remove the thread and extract the needle.</end_of_turn>
E fay aquo a totas, e layssa de aquelas una e no la cozes, per so que la superfluitat del sanc corra de aquela.	Do all of this, and let one go of those and do not hold it, so that the surplus of the healing may run from that.</end_of_turn>
E aprop pausa sobre le cul drap enfus en oli rozat o en cerot; e pausa aquel sobre·l cuol e comanda al malaute que·s repause.	And place your hand over the abdomen soaked in olive oil or in cerate; and place that over the bladder and command the patient to rest.</end_of_turn
E aprop layssa aquela entro que caja; e quan es casuda, cura aquelas am enguentz o am autra curacio entro que sia sanat.	And let that go into the box; and when it is necessary, care for them with ointment or another cure until they are healed.</end_of_turn>
De curacio de fistulas.	Treatment of fistula.</end_of_turn>
Motas veguadas accideys per exseccacio de fenda o per costriccio de natura.	Moist wounds are caused by excessive discharge from a wound or by restriction of nature.</end_of_turn
E cum so antiquadas e no val en aquela medicina, lahoras cove que tu razas aquelas am la puncta de spatum o am la tua ungla entro que sian faytas humidas e sia hostada de aquelas la escorsa pus desus, la qual prohibeys aquelas de consolidacio; e aprop cura aquelas entro que sian consolidadas.	And since they are ancient and do not work in this medicine, it is necessary that you grasp those with the thumb or with your nail until they are moist and that you host those with the thick pus that comes out, which hinders those from solidifying; and thus cure those until they are solidified.</end_of_turn
Lahoras tu osta aquelas am razio pus vehement que la primieyra entro que mot sancno e sian excoriadas; e aprop cura aquelas entro que sian sanadas.	However, keep those moist in a greater proportion than the first time until the wound is healed and is scorched; and then cure those until they are healed.</end_of_turn
De curacio de almesamir, so es clau.	As for the treatment of boils, that is key.</end_of_turn
Sapias que alamermar, so es clau, e no es si no notz redon segon la color del cors semblant a cap de claviel, e es fayt en tot le cors e majorment en las partidas dejos les pes e als ditz, e endeve per aquels dolor deves le anament.	I say that to apply a blistering plaster is key, and do not be surprised if you notice it round according to the color of the body resembling the head of a nail, and it is useful in all parts of the body and especially in the lower parts of the legs and the feet, and because of those pains you must bind them.</end_of_turn

E si vols, cauteriza le segont que es precedit en le sieu capitol.	And if you wish, cauterize them according to what is said above in the head.</end_of_turn
Mays de veruca es eminencia petita aspre fistulada redonda sobre la superficia del cos, e motas veguadas veno en las mas dels enfantz.	But a wart is a small, rough, round elevation on the surface of the body, and moist boils are common in the most of children.</end_of_turn
E curacio de lu es que estendas e inscidas aquela, o que estrenhas aquela am fiel o am pel entro que caja.	And the treatment for them is to stretch and instill them, or to open them with thread or hair so that they burst.</end_of_turn

But a termite is a small, fragrant or large fistula on the surface of the body that when it is cold finds itself in it resembling the bite of a termite, and it is useful around the body.</end>

And the treatment is to take a needle of fine awl or of needle of bolt, and be strong, and place that over the termite until it is contained by the circle of the needle of the parts of the body; and then rotate your hand over the needle until you instill what is in the circuit of the termite, and place that in the buttock of the body, and evacuate the termite from its root.</end_of_turn
E si vols, fay aquo am canula de eram o de ferr segon aquesta forma:	And if you wish, do the same with a canula of gut or iron according to this manner:

De forma dels instrumentz que so aministratz a dar cristeri.	In the manner of the instruments that are administered to give comfort.</end_of_turn
Alcunas veguadas es fayt cristeri de argent o de lato o de eram fondut o malleat; e alcunas veguadas es fayt de aquels instrumentz petit e gran segon aquels als quals so aministratz, quar aquel que es aministrat en la curacio dels petitz enfants sia petit; e de aquel dels quals los culs son freuls o doloyrozes, les cristeris de aquels sian petitz.	Some vegetables are caused by the crystallization of silver or lead or of alum or mercury; and some vegetables are caused by those instruments which are small or great according as they are administered, forasmuch as anyone who is administering them in the care of small children is small; and of those from which the buttocks are rough or painful, their crystals are small.
La forma de cristeri gran e pauc:	The form of great and few crystals:
Le cap de la canula de lu desus en le qual es liada la borsa sia ampla segon aquesta manieyra; e sia a lu distinacio la on la borsa es liada ayssi cum vezes.	The head of the needle from which the bag is suspended is wide according to this manner; and that it be distinguished by the place where the bag is suspended thus as often.
